thread.section_title: Hotel Raphael - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Really should be 4.5 stars
thread.title_full: Really should be 4.5 stars - Review of Hotel Raphael, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: james k
title: Really should be 4.5 stars
text:
Worth 5 stars:
Friendly, helpful staff (with one exception [see below]).
Beautiful public rooms, including lobby area, bar, sitting areas and breakfast room.
Outstanding breakfast with attentive, professional service and large array of food, very well maintained.
Not worth 5 stars:
My wife and I booked a junior suite and were upgraded to deluxe junior suite (room 408). It was quite large. However, it had a somewhat dated appearance, and seemed to need renovation to be commensurate with the rest of the hotel. In addition, there was also a mild septic smell that persisted in the bathroom.
We must also comment on our experience at the bar. We returned from dinner wishing to have a late-night cocktail in the very beautiful, lush, warm and inviting bar. We were the only patrons when we arrived. The bartender seated us with the proviso that we would need to complete our order within 25 minutes, as he was about to close down for the night. We took our drinks. During the next 15 minutes 3 other couples entered the bar and were told that they would need to order in the next 10-15 minutes. They stayed, but the procedure should have been more inviting. Doesnâ€™t the hotel want the business?
